description:
http://anidb.net/ch115893 [Joe] helps http://anidb.net/ch115892 [Chief] get ready to fight in the upcoming tournament while dealing with his own demons.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Si deseas la danina pudricion de las raices, no bloquees la boca del anfora
Wazurai no Ne Kusare o Nozomu nara, Mizugame no Ana o Fusaguna
患いの根腐れを望むなら, 水瓶の穴を塞ぐな
